Method Detail

digest

public static byte[] digest(java.lang.String algorithm,
                            java.io.InputStream in)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Calculate the checksum of a given InputStream. The stream is guaranteed to be closed after ended operation. If you need a String version of the digest use Bytes.toHex(byte[]).

Parameters:
algorithm - the algorithm to use to compute the digest. Possbile values can be found in the Java CryptoSpec.
in - the stream to digest
Returns:
the computed digest in a byte array
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the input stream
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm requested in algorithm isn't known to the jvm.

digest

public static byte[] digest(java.lang.String algorithm,
                            byte[] in)
                     throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Calculate the checksum of a byte array. The array will be read in one chunk. If you need a String version of the digest use Bytes.toHex(byte[]).

Parameters:
algorithm - the algorithm to use to compute the digest. Possbile values can be found in the Java CryptoSpec.
in - array the byte array to compute the digest of
Returns:
the computed digest in a byte array
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm requested in algorithm isn't known to the jvm.

digest

                     throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Calculate the checksum of a given String. If you need a String version of the digest use Bytes.toHex(byte[]).

Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
See Also:

Calculate the SHA-1 checksum of a string. If you need a String version of the digest use Bytes.toHex(byte[]).

Throws:
DigestException - if the JVM doesn't know the SHA-1 algorithm
